text: The 2019–20 Israeli Basketball National League (or the Liga Leumit) is the 20th season of the Israeli Basketball National League. ==Teams== The following teams had changed divisions after the 2018–19 season: ;Relegated from Premier League *Bnei Herzliya ;Promoted from Liga Artzit *A.S.
